changeSet.id: add tie break to current term function mssql
changeSet.author: dan.mccallum
changeSet.sql: ALTER FUNCTION ${schema}.CURRENT_TERM_CODE() RETURNS VARCHAR(25) AS BEGIN DECLARE @code VARCHAR(25) set @code = (select top 1 code from ${schema}.external_term term where term.end_date >= cast(GetDate() as date) order by start_date asc, end_date desc) RETURN @code END;
